committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Interior to enter into an agreement with the counties of Benzie and Leelanau, Michigan, with respect to the repair and maintenance of certain highways owned by such counties and located in and around the Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of the Interior to enter into an agreement with each of the counties of Benzie and Leelanau in Michigan under which the Secretary shall pay all of the repair and maintenance costs for any highways owned by such counties in and around the Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore where such costs are attributable to lakeshore traffic.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Interior to enter into an agreement with the counties of Benzie and Leelanau, Michigan, with respect to the repair and maintenance of certain highways owned by such counties and located in and around the Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore.
